text: No, non-veg food is not available in NIET hostels.
Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are available in NIET hostels every day. More information is available on the website.
Tea or coffee is available during breakfast in the hostel mess.
Washing machine facilities are provided by the hostel for washing clothes.
Iron is not provided by the hostel.
Hostel rooms are equipped with essential furniture including a bed, almirah, study table, chair, and book shelf for students.
WiFi connectivity is available in the hostel premises for academic and educational purposes.
RO water supply and water coolers are available in hostels to provide safe drinking water to students.
Geyser facilities are provided in hostels to ensure availability of hot water for students.
